text: - My name is Lidiya Tilahun,

I work as a Software
Developer Engineer at AWS,
and I'm based in Berlin.
I came from Ethiopia to do my Bachelor's

in Computer Science and
Electrical Engineering.

So at the university I
actually started coding.

After that I worked as a
Software Developer Engineer,
as well as DevOps for five years.
And then I joined AWS last year.
My day-to-day at AWS
is very different from one day to another.
I work with customer to get requirements,

and then I also design systems
based on those requirements.
I go through design reviews,
and I also, of course, implement and code.
When I joined, the expectation
of a Software Developer that I had

from my previous experience
was quite different,
because I actually work with customer,

I interact with customer, I
get to see the requirement,

refine the requirement,
design system, implement.
Whereas in other, in my previous role,

I was more a so of the
implementation side.
So if you are looking for a place
that you are always challenged, right?
You're out of your comfort zone,
you're learning something new every day,
this is exactly the place for you to be.
The most exciting part about my role,
is that I don't know what I'm going to do
three months from now.
It's very exciting because that means
I know I will learn something new
and my work is never boring.

It's exciting, it's challenging,
but at the end of it,
I will be a better builder.
